channel.title: The BIGASS Weapon Concept Thread!
channel.description:
Possible format to suggest a weapon:
> Weapon Name: > > Weapon Appearance: > > Execution Animation:
----
Examples:
----
Weapon Name: Spear
Weapon Appearance: Long wooden spear, both ends sharpened and steel-tipped.
Execution Animation: Executioner tries to jab the accused with the spear. Accused backs up, barely avoiding it. Executioner lifts spear over-hand and throws it through accused's chest.
----
Weapon Name: War Hammer
Weapon Appearance: Like Thor's hammer, Mjolnir.
Execution Animation: Executioner hits accused with an under-hand hammer swing. Accused flies up into the air from being hit. Accused never comes down.
----
Weapon Name: Poison Vial
Weapon Appearance: A green glass vial of poison, over-sized so as to be easily seen.
Execution Animation: Executioner trows the vial at the accused, shattering it on their face. Accused falls down holding face as green mist surrounds them.
----
Weapon Name: Hidden Daggers
Weapon Appearance: Sleeve-mounded retractable hidden daggers.
Execution Animation: Executioner casually walks up to accused. Executioner holds out arms (picture Wolverine) and reveals hidden wrist blades. Executioner makes crossing slashes in an X-shape across accused's chest.
----
Weapon Name: Toilet Plunger
Weapon Appearance: A standard toilet plunger.
Execution Animation: Executioner sticks the plunger to the accused's face. Executioner gives it a couple plunges. Accused falls over comically.
----
So.... post your own. Let's get a mega-thread going!

item.title: The BIGASS Weapon Concept Thread!
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
Weapon Name : Boslofian Gauntlets

Weapon Appearance:

Two Boxing Gloves shaped like apples.

Execution Animation:
Executioner runs up to the target. And blows a flurry of punches. He then knocks the accused to the hround , and smashes an apple on his face.

Read full topic

item.title: The BIGASS Weapon Concept Thread!
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Weapon name: Tormental

Weapon appearance:

A long chain of metal, it have a lot of thorn on it.

Execution Animation:

Executioner throw the chain around the accused, stranded them, and then slowly pull the chain back, making accused lie on the ground with blood around them, slowly piling up.

Read full topic

item.title: The BIGASS Weapon Concept Thread!
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
Possible format to suggest a weapon:

Weapon Name:

Weapon Appearance:

Execution Animation:

Examples:

Weapon Name:
Spear

Weapon Appearance:
Long wooden spear, both ends sharpened and steel-tipped.

Execution Animation:
Executioner tries to jab the accused with the spear.
Accused backs up, barely avoiding it.
Executioner lifts spear over-hand and throws it through accused’s chest.

Weapon Name:
War Hammer

Weapon Appearance:
Like Thor’s hammer, Mjolnir.

Execution Animation:
Executioner hits accused with an under-hand hammer swing.
Accused flies up into the air from being hit.
Accused never comes down.

Weapon Name:
Poison Vial

Weapon Appearance:
A green glass vial of poison, over-sized so as to be easily seen.

Execution Animation:
Executioner trows the vial at the accused, shattering it on their face.
Accused falls down holding face as green mist surrounds them.

Weapon Name:
Hidden Daggers

Weapon Appearance:
Sleeve-mounded retractable hidden daggers.

Execution Animation:
Executioner casually walks up to accused.
Executioner holds out arms (picture Wolverine) and reveals hidden wrist blades.
Executioner makes crossing slashes in an X-shape across accused’s chest.

Weapon Name:
Toilet Plunger

Weapon Appearance:
A standard toilet plunger.

Execution Animation:
Executioner sticks the plunger to the accused’s face.
Executioner gives it a couple plunges.
Accused falls over comically.

So… post your own. Let’s get a mega-thread going!
